name: growl
effect: Lowers the target’s Attack by one stage.
short_effect: Lowers the target’s Attack by one stage.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user growls in an endearing way, making opposing Pokémon less wary. This lowers their Attack stat.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user growls in an endearing way, making opposing Pokémon less wary. This lowers their Attack stat.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user growls in an endearing way, making opposing Pokémon less wary. This lowers their Attack stat.
